title: A post limit for me
content:
Yesterday I found out that I suddenly had a post limit of one post a day. I emailed Xtraverse about it but I don't think he has checked his mail.

I have absolutely no clue what I did wrong this time but I'm very curious to know. So I hope to get the attention of an admin with this topic and your opinon.
Sorry I know this topic sucks better luck next time.

title: Re: A post limit for me
content: I voted the first option. I have no knowledge about this limit, and as far as I can see you have done nothing wrong. Hopefully it'll be solved soon.Eat your veggies!

title: Re: A post limit for me
content:
Djaser, your a pretty cool guy, and I don't see why you would deserve a post limit. You haven't been spamming this place up like me.[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-stunned.gif[/img]

Hopefully, this will be fixed soon.Signed, Harvey Smith
A proud member of the beta testing society
"I help entertain!" -Harvey
Tough guys have no table manners![img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-dopefish.gif[/img]

title: Re: A post limit for me
content: Maybe just a mistake...[hr]The human brain is not user-friendly...
